title: Amazon API Gateway HTTP API with Cognito JWT and AWS Lambda integration
description: This pattern creates an Amazon Gateway API (v2) and two Lambda functions protected by JwtAuthorizer and Cognito for user management.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern creates an Amazon API Gateway HTTP API with JWTAuthorizer and Cognito as user management. It integrates with one unprotected Lambda and one protected Lambda..
